title: Minutes to the fabulous Las Vegas Strip
posting_body: ['Monaco Park', '8350 West Desert Inn Road, Las Vegas, NV, 89117', 'Want more info on this unit?', 'See the link (below):', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 133', 'OR Text', '133', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'WHERE LUXURY IS A WAY OF LIFE', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1056 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Meet Monaco Park, a modernized apartment community where luxury is felt.', 'We may not be stretched along the coastline of the Mediterranean Sea, but we have our own little slice of the French Riviera on West Desert Inn in Spring Valley, Las Vegas.', 'With two resort-styled pools, gated access, and options for private detached garages – we’ve carefully designed this living experience for the sophisticated.', 'Features', '- Double-Paned Windows', '- Premium Flooring*', '- Designer Lighting Package*', '- Gas Fireplaces', '- Intrusion Alarms', '- Highly-Efficient Central A/C', '- Spacious Floor Plans', '- Whirlpool Appliances', '- Homes WiFi ready with pre-installed modem and 1st month free, provided by Cox.', '- Ceiling fans', '- Expansive Pantry Space', '- Designer Plumbing Package*', '- Full-Sized Washers and Dryers', '*Restrictions and additional fees may apply.', 'See Sales Associate for details.', 'Community Amenities', '- Business Center with Conference Room', '- Minutes from Downtown, Shopping Centers and Entertainment', '- Amazon Hub Lockers', '- Individual Private Garages*', '- Gated Community with Controlled Access', '- Two Resort-Style Pools with Sundecks', '- 24-Hour State-of-the-Art Fitness Center', '- We Love Pets!*', '- 24-Hour Game Room', '- Gas Grilling Stations', '- Covered Parking', 'Office Hours', 'Monday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Tuesday:11:00AM-6:00PM', 'Wednesday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'We Love Pets!', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'aYJ793Q5XeE']
